name: Broken Brush RED
description:
Spot the differences in classical paintings with Broken Brush RED!

Broken Brush RED has classical paintings that due to nudity, violence or horror are not available in the original Broken Brush, such as Botticelli's The Birth of Venus and Michelangelo's The Creation of Adam.

* 30 paintings
* HD graphics
* Intuitive gameplay
* Hint system

Find the mismatching elements between two images: the one on the left is the original painting while the one on the right has minor variations.

The interface is easy to use and lets you explore high definition images of classical paintings: pinch to zoom, drag to pan the image, and tap to mark the differences.

You can use hints to help you narrow down and find the harder differences. Solve paintings to earn more hints.

Find all the differences in Broken Brush RED!
